text: Kezia Alexandra Ross Dugdale (born 28 August 1981) is a Scottish politician. She was the leader of the Scottish Labour Party from 2015 until 2017. She was a member of the Scottish Parliament. In July 2017, it was announced Dugdale was in a relationship with Jenny Gilruth, a Scottish National Party politician. In June 2022, Gilruth and Dugdale married in a private ceremony. ==Notes== == References == Category:1981 births Category:Labour Party (UK) members of the Scottish Parliament Category:Lesbians Category:Scottish LGBT people Category:British LGBT politicians Category:British bloggers Category:Politicians from Aberdeen Category:Living people
title: Kezia Dugdale
